title: Leading smartphone and tablet activities 2017 , by device
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 17 different Responses for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone that are presented on the X-axis.
In Response E-mail, Smartphone had the highest SOME LABEL 59.0 among the 2 groups and in Trading securities/shares online, Tablet had the lowest SOME LABEL 4.0.
In Response Watching movies/videos online, Tablet had the highest SOME LABEL among all 17 Responses and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Trading securities/shares online.
The maximum SOME LABEL for Tablet that was found in Response Watching movies/videos online was 5.75 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Trading securities/shares online.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 17 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, Smartphone had the highest SOME LABEL in Response E-mail and Tablet had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Trading securities/shares online.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 17 different Responses for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone that are presented on the X-axis.
In Response E-mail, Smartphone had the highest SOME LABEL 59.0 among the 2 groups and in Trading securities/shares online, Tablet had the lowest SOME LABEL 4.0.
In Response Watching movies/videos online, Tablet had the highest SOME LABEL among all 17 Responses and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Trading securities/shares online.
The maximum SOME LABEL for Tablet that was found in Response Watching movies/videos online was 5.75 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Trading securities/shares online.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 17 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, Smartphone had the highest SOME LABEL in Response E-mail and Tablet had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Trading securities/shares online.
In Response Watching movies/videos online, Tablet had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Response Trading securities/shares online out of all 17 Responses.
Response Watching movies/videos online and Trading securities/shares online had the biggest gap of 19.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Tablet.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of Tablet.
On average, the Response E-mail had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. Whereas Trading securities/shares online had the lowest average SOME LABEL.

data.Response: Visiting online dating websites/services or apps
